welcome.subtitle: Ready to perform 468-point face analysis with FaceAnalyzer AI using your {{membership}} account?

cta.title: Discover Your Face
cta.description: Analyze 468 special points of your face with our unique face analysis technology using advanced AI algorithms.
cta.disclaimer: Your photos are processed locally. Privacy guaranteed.

analysis.title: FaceAnalyzer Analysis Results
analysis.swipeHint: Swipe to compare original and mesh

excellent.title: Excellent Quality!
excellent.details:

acceptable.note: You can proceed but you may retry for better results.

messages.notEnoughPoints: Not enough points detected ({{count}}). Please take a clearer photo.
messages.criticalPointsMissing: Some critical facial points could not be detected. Your entire face must be visible.
messages.tooClose: Face too close - Move the camera back a bit
messages.tooFar: Face too small - Move the camera closer or center your face

disclaimer: Results are approximate assessments generated by AI. Photo quality and lighting may affect results.

photoGuidelines.title: Photo Guidelines
photoGuidelines.subtitle: Please follow these rules for best results:

rules.title: Important Rules:
rules.list:
â€¢ Your face must be fully visible
â€¢ Look directly at the camera
â€¢ Hair or hands should not cover face
â€¢ Lighting should be sufficient

multiPhoto.title: 3-Photo Analysis
multiPhoto.subtitle: Take 3 photos for more accurate results
multiPhoto.lowConsistencyWarning: Photos are inconsistent. Results may not be reliable.

warning.title: Notice
warning.message: We recommend 3 photos for more accurate results. Do you want to continue?

qualityAlert.title: Low Quality Photos
qualityAlert.message: Some of your photos have low or poor quality. This may affect the accuracy of your analysis. Do you still want to proceed?

guidance.title: Photo Tips
guidance.tip4: Make sure your whole face is visible

noFace.title: Face Not Found
noFace.message:
Face could not be detected in the photo. Please:
â€¢ Make sure your face is clearly visible
â€¢ Take the photo in good lighting
â€¢ Look straight at the camera

saveError.title: Save Error
saveError.message: Analysis could not be saved. Please try again.

mediaPipeNotReady.title: MediaPipe Not Ready
mediaPipeNotReady.message: Web technology has not loaded yet. Please wait.

processingError.title: Processing Error
processingError.message: Image could not be processed with MediaPipe. Please try again.

noScanFound.title: No Scan Found
noScanFound.message: You haven't performed a face scan yet or the data could not be loaded.

apiError.title: API Key Not Found
apiError.message: OpenRouter API key is not configured.
